item.title: Git Cheat Sheet
item.description: Mastering source control is essential for a software developer, but Git can get a little confusing when youâ€™re first starting out. Here is a list of commands to use as a reference – I've included all the basics you would need to use Git from the command line. Command Description git status Check the status of the current branch. git branch List the current branches.
